name: Hinterlands: Pilgrimage (alpha)
description:
PILGRIMAGE is a weird fantasy/sci-fi RPG in the HINTERLANDS campaign
setting. 

*CONTROLS*

KEYBOARD:
Move                        - Arrow Keys
Action/Confirm   - ENTER
Menu/Cancel        - ESC

CONTROLLER:
Move                        - D-Pad
Action/Confirm  - A
Menu/Cancel       - B

*TIPS*

Access "Party Chat" from the main menu to talk to your companions.

Use "The Tome of Yoth" to view maps, objectives, and details about enemies you've encountered.
